name: eviolite
effect: Held by a Pokémon that is not fully evolved : Holder has 1.5× Defense and Special Defense.
short_effect: Held: Holder has 1.5× Defense and Special Defense, as long as it’s not fully evolved.

flavor_text.black_white: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
